definition: lit. fence town/buffer region (between enemies)/Tang dynasty system of provincial administration under a provincial governor 節度使|节度使[jie2 du4 shi3]
to press down/to calm/to subdue/to suppress/to guard/garrison/small town/to cool or chill (food or drinks)

sentences.english: In the period of five dynasties and ten states, the military governorship of late Tang dynasty continued to develop.
sentences.chinese: 五代十國時期是唐末藩鎮割據的繼續和發展。

sentences.english: The Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period is the continuation and development of the Late Tang Dynasty opposite to the splittism.
sentences.chinese: 五代十國時期是唐末藩鎮割據的繼續和發展。

definition: Tangut branch of the Qiang 羌 ethnic group/ancient ethnic group who made up the Xixia dynasty 西夏 1038-1227
first Sui emperor (541-604) Yang Jian (541-604), reigned 581-604
to propose (for a job)/to nominate/to recommend
Later Zhou of the Five Dynasties (951-960), centered on Shandong and Hebei, with capital at Kaifeng 开封
to be in charge of something specific
Western Jin dynasty 西晋 historian, author of History of the Three Kingdoms 三國志|三国志
Jiangling county in Jingzhou 荊州|荆州[Jing1 zhou1], Hubei
